CSIRT - Manager and technical at Advens
France
Summary
Passionate about my work and a voracious appetite for security,
I also test many solutions to develop recognized skills in
Cybersecurity.
Projects are as varied as the security issues faced by our clients: risk
analysis, architecture studies, system hardening, user awareness,
support for security projects, penetration testing, design of secure
architectures, business continuity plans, PKI, etc.
Experience
Advens
4 years 9 months
CSIRT - First level manager and technical 
January 2019 - Present  (1 year 9 months)
Région de Paris, France
Responsible for the creation of a CSIRT, I am in the first level manager team.
We organize the activity, define the services, the tools and the scope.
In operation, we qualify customer requests, we will recruit the incident
response team in our internal skills and we adapt the reaction to the incident.
Certifications passed :
Cybereason Certified Technical Specialist
Cybereason Certified Security Expert
Cybereason Certified Threat Hunter
training followed :
ENISA European Union Agency For Cybersecurity
SANS - 401 Security Essential
SANS - 503 Intrusion Detection
SANS - 508 Advanced Incident Response and Threat Hunting
SANS - 660 Advanced Penetration Testing, Exploit Writing and Ethical
Hacking
  Page 1 of 7
   
CyberSecurity Senior Specialist
January 2018 - Present  (2 years 9 months)
Paris Area, France
Dedicated to the DIRISI (direction interarmées des réseaux d'infrastructure
et des systèmes d'informations de la défense) market for SOC activities and
hardening of systems of the Ministry of the french Army. Trained in regulations
on the French Military Programming Law and Vital French organizations, my
main missions are :
- Understand the security issues in relation to cyber risks,
- Analyze architectures
- Identify or imagine best way of threat detection,
- Manage multi-skill teams (pentesters, analysts, technicals and auditers),
- Follow the different phases of the projects, in a supervisory role, or in a
contributor role,
- Contribute to innovation and development of detection technics.
Training followed :
Deep Knowledge in MITRE ATT&CK
Advanced Training on SPLUNK
Training Securing industrial networks
Training  Deep Inspection Packet 
Offensive Security Training: Cracking the perimeter CTP
Deceptive Security Training
Nessus Scanner Training
SOC Solution Integration Manager 
January 2017 - February 2018  (1 year 2 months)
Région de Lille, France
I was in charge of customer SOC's integration : Sec architecture, Sec Log and
SOC exploitation. 
Team leader of three experts in order to cover perimeter.
As part of a team specialising in responding to security incidents (CSIRT),
I supported our teams in optimising the operational security policy on our
customers' infrastructures. I intervened for the Advens SOC and put my
expertise to work for our clients and internal teams. I was involved in the
configuration of the technologies managed and supervised by our Security
Operated Center.
My main missions were:
- Supporting our teams in the deployment of mySoc services to our clients,
  Page 2 of 7
   
Assist in the qualification and resolution of security incidents,
- Maintain or upgrade information system architectures and configurations to
adapt them to 
monitoring plans,
- Perform configuration and logging policy reviews aligned with SOC Risk
analysis,
- Define the prerequisites for the deployment of mySoc services as well as the
technical integration 
procedures,
- Participate in integrations and provide support to the operating teams.(like
making full malware analysis of NotPetya and Wannacry)
- Proactive technology watch
- Model assembly for proof of concept
Self Courses follow :
Training Industrial Network Security
Training SANS 401 Security essentials
Training SANS 503 Intrusion Detection
Training SANS 508 Advanced Incident Response Training
Training Certified Ethical Hacker
Training Offensive 101
training SIEM (QRadar, SPLUNK, ALIEN VAULT and ELK)
SOC Security Operation Manager
January 2016 - January 2017  (1 year 1 month)
Région de Paris, France
Our Technology department's mission is to identify and reference high added
value security technologies on the market. Associated with our expertise
and our support offers, we build, develop and provide services around the
referenced technologies to bring concrete and advanced answers to our
customers.
My activity is highly operational, with our customers in contact with the
technical teams. My main job being to follow them into a virtuous and iterative
circle similar to the Deming wheel. The axes are as much governance,
technical as human.
Training :
Malware analysis training on Cuckoo Sandboxer
Checkmarks static code analysis training
F5 Big-IP Training

Certified DenyAll
PaloAlto Network Firewall Training
Amazon Web Service Architect Training

Chief Information Security Operation (CISO) Training
ALPHA 3 INFORMATIQUE PICARDIE CHAMPAGNE-ARDENNE
Sales Engineer
December 2013 - December 2015  (2 years 1 month)
Soissons
We help companies to take advantage of their computers to increase
productivity 
and competitiveness. Because computers must not become a source of
problems, 
we accompany you for you allow you to focus on the most important: your job.
Training Apache Hadoop

NextiraOne (NXO France)
Sales Engineer
October 2010 - November 2013  (3 years 2 months)
Région de Amiens, France
NextiraOne and its partners bring you the best technologies and services
in the field of Digital Infrastructures (LAN/WLAN/WAN, Data Center),
Communication and Collaboration Solutions (Telephony, Collaborative Work
and Contact Center) and Security.
We have the highest levels of certification on each of the key technologies
selected from our partners' catalog, with whom we collaborate over time and in
confidence.
  Page 4 of 7
   
My MISSIONS
- Expand the existing customer base and win new customers by promoting the
NXO offer.
- Achieves the commercial objectives set by his hierarchy by implementing
targeting, prospecting, presentation and negotiation of offers.
- Ensures proper order processing and customer follow-up.
- History the customer relationship in the company's tools (CRM SalesForces)
- Establishes activity reporting and proposes the associated action plan.
- Intervenes in the resolution of customer disputes.
- Sale and For-Sale of datacenter solutions
Certifications :
Cisco Sales Expert ( telephony, LAN and WLAN)
Cisco Datacenter Networking Solution Sales

Microsoft serveur 2008, 2003, exchange, MOCS, office 2010 et Online
Services.
CheckPoint Certified Security Administrator (CCSA)
Cisco DataCenter Network Infrastructure 2 (Nexus)
AXIANS
Business Manager
June 2006 - August 2010  (4 years 3 months)
Région de Amiens, France
Axians provides all its customers, whether they are companies,
administrations, service providers or telecom operators, with a range of
solutions to design, deploy and manage their network infrastructures. These
solutions combine software, hardware and customized services with the
specificities of different markets.
Our solutions are hybrid: they are deployed on site or are provided according
to a SaaS "Solution as a Service" model. We achieve this flexibility by
investing in our outstanding teams, whose talent enables us to design
comprehensive and innovative offerings.
  Page 5 of 7
   
We are present at every stage of our clients' projects, with the will to help them
achieve their objectives and optimize their performance.
Certifications: 
TrendMicro Foundation Certification (TFC)
Cisco CCNA, CCDA
Checkpoint Administrator CCSA
VMWare 5.5 : VTSP and VTP (sales and pre-sales)
HP Procurve AIS 
HAZEMEYER
IoT Business manager
January 2003 - March 2006  (3 years 3 months)
Région de Saint-Quentin, France
A complete and autonomous solution allowing the individual management
of each departure and arrival. The CIT offers an optimal protection of the
feeders, integrating for example anti-cavitation, thermal heating, overcurrent,
earth fault (differential) thus reducing the sources of breakdown and the
costs of maintenance operations. Autonomous and easy to set up, the
